page.title: 157 Year Olds and Cement
page.content: Blue Circle wanted to dig a chalk pit in Darenth Woods to make cement, but Dartford Council and the active resident groups didn't want them to. Our school visits the woods a lot. If they dig a quarry there, all the trees will be destroyed and flowers will not grow. The wildlife will be ruined, there will be no birds and no squirrels. The view would be horrid and it would make a dreadful mess. I think we need cement for things like buildings and the Thmes Barrier. We need it for bridges and roads. Two classes had a vote to see who wanted Blue Circle to dig the holes. Most people didn't want them to do it. We think there are enough pits around here even if another one would make more jobs.
